description: Riding the resort all day while the snow cranks? Suit up in the Men's GORE-TEX® Lightray Pants. Waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX fabric, a PFC-free water-repelling finish, and their 100% seam-taped construction keep you dry no matter how wet and wild it gets on the mountain, from snow covered chairlifts to yard sale wipeouts. PrimaLoft® Black Insulation ECO delivers lightweight warmth that will replace the need for a mid-layer, making layering easier than ever. These pants even have articulated knees for the telemarkers and CORDURA® scuff guards to resist abrasions when you're traversing the trees. For added safety, the RECCO® Avalanche Rescue Reflector bounces back a signal to rescuers.
name: Marmot Lightray GTX Pants - Mens
